lessons.title: Continuous Integration
lessons.content: CI runs tests on every commit. Build, test, report. Catch breakage before merge.

lessons.title: Deployment pipelines
lessons.content: CD automates deploy after green build. Stages: build → test → deploy. Use secrets for credentials.

lessons.title: Logs and metrics
lessons.content: Logs are events; metrics are numbers over time. Centralize logs. Track latency, errors, throughput.

lessons.title: Alerts
lessons.content: Alert on symptoms, not causes. Set thresholds. Avoid alert fatigue with good grouping and runbooks.
